explains: vt. 使解脱；解救；使游离

sentences.en: They managed to extricate the pilot from the tangled control panel.
sentences.cn: 他们设法把困在控制盘里的飞行员救了出来。

sentences.en: He had managed to extricate himself from most of his official duties.
sentences.cn: 他终于摆脱了大部分公务。

sentences.en: He endeavoured to extricate the car, digging with his hands in the blazing sunshine.
sentences.cn: 他拼命想要把那辆汽车弄出来，在烈日下用手挖着。
